page.title: 13Tourism In Dymchurch
page.content: In Dymchurch there are many things to interest tourists.For children there are amusement arcades,the funfair & the beach,for adults:restaurants,pubs, a bingo hall & lovely views across the sands and sea.Another attraction is the light railway which travels across Romney Marsh.A survey on a Sunday afternoon in July showed 1.Where visi- tors came from:68% - Kent 18% - London 14% - Elsewhere 2.How long they stayed:81% where day visitors. 3.Why they came to Dymchurch:most said that they came for the sands & because they thought it a safe place for child -ren.Some have B.& B. in the village. The Waterside Guest house can accommo- date 20 people (Â£9 for adults-Â£6 child -ren).For breakfast they get cereals, eggs & bacon,toast & marmalade & tea.
